dialogue.text: {i}Well, I hope she’s doing better than we are right now.{/i}
{i}She’s probably still asleep. I can never get her out of bed this early.{/i}
Mmn......mngh....
{i}AHH! NGHH!...AAAHHH! NO! S...STOP! PLEASE! I CAN’T...ACK...I CAN’T...BREATHE!
Keep your fucking mouth shut or I’m taping it closed, bitch! You do what I fuckin’ tell you, got it?!
IT HURTS! IT HURTS!...NNGAAAHHH! STOP! GET OFF OF ME! PLEASE! SOMEONE HELP!
Hah.....hah.....hah......mngh...
The fuck did I just tell you?! Now it’s gonna hurt even more, you fucking thirsty slut!
SOMEONE...NGACKHH...HELP....ME! I CAN’T....I CAN’T....GET HIM...OFF OF ME!
You know you...fuckin’ like it! You love my fucking cock! Say it! Say it!
NGFHHHFGHHHPFFHTTT!!!!  MMMNNNGNHGHGHGH?!??!?!?!
I’m gonna cum.....I’m-
Hey, Sana. Sorry to wake you up, but I’m back a little early.
My breakfast plans didn’t last as long as I expected. Apparently, Makoto agreed to head over to the hotel early to start decorating with Miku and Futaba. And Maya just...didn’t even show up.
On top of that, Ami {i}still{/i} won’t let me see Sensei. And even Geoffrey is busy today since he’s going to an indoor skating rink with his previously-estranged son.
It’s like everyone is getting off to a fun Christmas start without me and I just have to suffer.
But hey, story of my life at this point. You know?
Hahah! Sure do!
Um...what are you doing?
P...Push-ups?...
Um...{i}why?{/i} And why aren’t you asleep? You’re never out of bed this early.
I...I decided to...start exercising?
Well, that would certainly explain why your face is beet-red. But it doesn’t really explain why you’re pressing down on your laptop for dear-
Wait, isn’t that {i}my{/i} laptop?
No. This one is mine. Yours is...yours is in the shop.
The shop?
I broke it.
You...broke my-
M...Merry Christmas! And...welcome back!
You’re up to something, aren’t you?
No!
Sana...
That’s me! Normal Sana! Who isn’t ever up to anything!
Hah...whatever. You’re the only close friend I have who’s yet to let me down, so I guess I’ll just take your word for it.
Also, why are you still in the dark if you’re awake? You’re going to go blind if you keep this up.
That’s okay! I’m used to...only using one eye anyway!
Come to think of it, why {i}did{/i} you start pulling your hair back? Everybody knew you as a cyclops and now you’re suddenly just a normal girl.
That’s...me...A normal girl...
I just...you know...it was time for a...change and stuff...
I’m a lot more...um...outgoing than I used to be, so...two eyes is...it’s fine now...
Right...
Right...
You know you don’t have to keep your hands on-
I’m good. Just ignore where my hands are and tell me more about your breakfast.
Right — the breakfast. Like I said, Makoto bailed and Maya didn’t show up. And when I went to Maya’s dorm just now, she wasn’t there. So either she was kidnapped, she died, or I was stood up.
And none of those things are good, but I’d feel particularly let down if it happened to be the latter-most of those options.
And...umm...what was the reason for this breakfast again?...
Something about fixing the infinite timeloop we’re all-
Sorry, could you...speak up a little? I can’t really hear-
We’re all caught in a timeloop and every time I try to tell you-
Sorry, but...I still can’t really hear you...
Hah...let’s just say I had something to discuss with the two of them about...school.
School? Does it have something to do with Miss Imai becoming our new full-time teacher? Because I’ve heard that some of the other girls have a problem with that as well...
Something about...too much homework or...something...
She’s not our new full-time teacher, Sana. Sensei’s going to come back. She’s just filling in for him until he does.
Y...Yeah. But...on the off-chance that he {i}doesn’t{/i} come back...she’ll be the full-time teacher...right?
Because I’ve already gotten used to her, but...a third teacher sounds like...a little much...you know?...
And I don’t really think I would survive in Miss Watabe’s class, so...
Sana, Sensei {i}is{/i} going to come back. I just need to figure out a way to get past Ami so I can talk to him and tell him that this new cycle isn’t as bad as he thinks it is. I think there’s hope.
Sorry, I didn’t really hear that...could you say it again?
Sensei’s going to come back and Miss Imai is going to return to being a cool student-teacher instead of an {i}actual{/i} teacher who makes us learn actual things.
That’s a relief because...I don’t enjoy learning new things very much...
At this point, I’m pretty tired of that as well.

It might sound a little rude, so please don’t repeat this to anyone, but I’ve had this feeling for a little while now that I’m the only person around here with her head screwed all the way on. No offense.
Uh...none...taken?...
I just mean that everybody around me has been bashing their head in trying to understand or...{i}explain{/i} things so intensely that they’ve like...killed half their braincells or something.
And now that Maya is a completely different person and Sensei isn’t even around, it’s making me feel like I’m the only {i}actual{/i} human left in this world. Again, no offense.
Again, none taken...but...what do you mean by “Maya is a completely different person?...”
Well, like...you know how, in the beginning of the school year, Sensei felt kind of...off? Like a switch just flipped in his head all of a sudden and he became the person we know him as today?
D...Did something like that happen?...Because I don’t...I don’t really remember that...
Maybe I just noticed it because I’ve been watching him for so long, but yeah. That happened. And, in a certain sense, I think that may have happened to Maya as well.
You really haven’t noticed her acting differently? Because I know you two weren’t exactly {i}close,{/i} but you did talk sometimes. And to me it’s like...night and day.
I...um...well...different {i}how{/i} exactly?...
Like...uh...she’s even more {i}Maya{/i} than usual?...Or something?...
Uhh...
It’s hard to explain. It just feels...wrong.
I...haven’t really noticed that...
In fact, I haven’t really...noticed {i}anyone{/i} acting any differently than normal...but I don’t know how long you’ve been feeling like you’re the only human, so...
Don’t worry about it, Sana. I’m kind of just venting at this point since all of the people I normally get to vent to have abandoned me.
I mean...{i}I’m{/i} still here?...
I know. Like I said, you’re the only person who’s yet to let me down.
But even {i}you{/i} have seemed a little...off lately. And by lately I mean...basically the entire summer. And also now. But hey, that might just be me not being ready for you to grow up yet.
Either way, I’m sure you have your reasons for whatever is going on. And I’m not going to pry since it would probably just make you uncomfortable.
Ayane...
Are you okay?
{i}No.{/i}
{i}I’m really not.{/i}
But as the self-proclaimed final human on the face of the earth, it’s up to me to stay strong.
There’s a time for tears and that time isn’t now, Sana.
I’m...impressed you can say that while crying...
These aren’t tears...My eyes are just sweating.
I don’t think it works that way...
Sana, you don’t have to worry about me. Just...keep being you and that’ll be more than enough. But also, feel free to slow down the growth a little bit if you want. I won’t mind.
I really wish I could...and you’re right, I think. I probably {i}have{/i} been acting differently.
I’ve been...I’ve been {i}feeling{/i} differently...
And I can’t really remember how it started, but...I think you might be right when you say it was summer...
It’s like...um...I don’t know if...using that “switch flipping” thing you said earlier is entirely accurate, but...maybe it’s easier for people to change than I thought?...
When {i}you’re{/i} the one changing...you never really know until it’s already over...
Like...you, for example...
Me? What about me? I don’t think I’ve changed all that much.
To me...you’ve changed more than anyone...but all of those changes have been good things...
You seem...stronger now...even when you’re upset...
Like...you went off on your own and...grinded a bunch of XP without inviting the rest of us...
Does...does that make sense?...
Honestly?...Yeah. Yeah, I think it does. And in a roundabout way, I think you’re right. About that {i}and{/i} how it’s hard to recognize any of that when you’re the subject.
Exactly...
So...maybe it’s just the level gap that’s...making you feel like you’re the only human left on the face of the earth...
And maybe the rest of us just...need to catch back up or something...
But...just because you’re a higher level doesn’t mean it’s {i}your{/i} responsibility to carry us through dungeons...
We can party up on our own...take down bosses without your help...and maybe one day, we’ll all be looking down at you...
So...do yourself a favor and...take a break every once in a while...
You’ve earned it.
Wow...
What?...
That was just...like...
Have you been taking public speaking classes or something?
I used to.
Not so much anymore.
Either way, that was an amazing analogy and...pretty much all of it hit the nail on the head.
I’ve been trying to take more breaks. I really have. I made it my one and only goal and everything.
But these days, it feels like God is toying with me — throwing every conceivable obstacle right at my face as I’m trying to relax. And that makes it really hard, Sana. {i}Really{/i} hard.
Just like with crying, though...there’s a time for breaks and a time to get serious. And I don’t even think my mind would {i}let{/i} me rest before I figure out what’s going on with Sensei.
I hope you figure it out soon...
I’m getting tired of all the homework...
Luckily for you, you’ll get at least {i}tonight{/i} off from doing homework as I volunteered you to come decorate for the Christmas party with me.
I take back everything I said tonight and I hate you.
I haven’t even bought my Secret Santa present yet.
Oh crap! I’ve been so busy trying to save the world that I forgot to do that as well.
Can I use your laptop for a second? I get guaranteed one-hour delivery since I’m subscribed to Amazon Optimus Prime. And I already have stuff saved in my wishlist for-
No.
No?
This one is broken too.
Sana...
No.
Is there something on that laptop you don’t want me to see?
Have you considered that maybe there is something on this laptop that {i}you{/i} don’t want to see?
I am going to go take a shower now. Please take as much time as you need to destroy the evidence.
I have no idea what you’re talking about.
Then neither do I.
Ayane takes a shower.
Sana never reaches orgasm.
{i}Sana’s affection has decayed by 10!{/i}
{i}Wake up from your pathetic, self-induced coma and go finger her until she cries! You’re allowed to now!{/i}
